jakob

I have not seen this problem.

Is this a new workspace for 3.1 M3 or a migrated workspace from an older 
Eclipse install?

Have you tried starting up 3.1M3 specifying "-clean" to remove the cached 
plugin registry data? This should be done when moving to a new version of 
Eclipse.

hi darin,

eclipse -clean solved the problem !

thanks
jakob
Thank you for reporting back Jakob.
